sawfowl.commandpack.api.commands.raw

Interface RawCommand

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.spongepowered.api.command.Command, org.spongepowered.api.command.Command.Raw, PluginCommand
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RawPlayerCommand

    public interface RawCommand
extends PluginCommand, org.spongepowered.api.command.Command.Raw
    This interface is designed to simplify the creation of Raw commands.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getEmptyCompletion

        java.util.List<org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandCompletion> getEmptyCompletion()
        The method is designed to define an empty autofill list.
        It is recommended to create a class variable to save resources.

      • getChildExecutors

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RawCommand> getChildExecutors()
        Subcommand map.
        The subcommands automatically get to the first place when the arguments are autocomplete.

      • getArguments

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,sawfowl.commandpack.api.commands.raw.arguments.RawArgument<?>> getArguments()
        Map of command arguments.

      • enableAutoComplete

        boolean enableAutoComplete()
        If `false`, the player will not get a list of available command arguments.
        Regardless of the return value, the player will receive variants of the child commands.
        This parameter will be ignored when overriding the #complete(CommandCause, Mutable) method.

      • getArgument

        default <T> java.util.Optional<T> getArgument(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                              java.lang.String[] args,
                                              int cursor)
        Getting an object from a command argument.
        Type Parameters:
        T - - The type of the returned object.
        Parameters:
        clazz - - The class of the returned object.
        args - - All command arguments.
        cursor - - The argument number of the command.
        Returns:
        Optional
